Component: Footer

Introduction

Having a common UI pattern for a footer element is just as key as having a common UI pattern for the header element. Using this markup will give you access to this, in addition to a few optional styles.

As a prerequisite for the footer being at the bottom of your page regardless of how long - or short - your content is, you'll need to add some code to your head. If having the footer at the bottom of your page does not matter, you can ignore this code altogether, and move on to the Options.

For footer at bottom of page add this 


  html {
    @include susy-breakpoint($small-desktop) {
      min-height: 90vh;
      padding-bottom: 10vh;
    }
  }

Still with me? Good, let's move on to Options.

Options

  1. default or light (using parent class: tsla-footer--light)
  2. centered- or left-aligned paragraph (tsla-footer--centered on element you want centered)
  3. with or without container. This is helpful if you want your footer to line up with the rest of your content which is wrapped in a container class.

Default Footer

This is the default styling for the footer. Black text, black links, black hover.

  • Unlinked Copy
  • Linked Copy
  • Linked Copy
  • Linked Copy
  • Linked Copy (hidden on mobile)
▲ 
<!-- ignore inline styling -->
<footer class="tsla-footer" style="position: static;">
  <div class="container">
    <ul class="tsla-footer-meta">
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item">Unlinked Copy</li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Linked Copy</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="/styleguide" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Linked Copy</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="/styleguide" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Linked Copy</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="/styleguide" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Linked Copy (hidden on mobile)</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</footer>

Light-colored Footer

Some pages or applications might want to have a light-colored footer.

  • Tesla © 2017
  • Privacy & Legal
  • Contact
  • Careers
  • Forums
  • Locations
▲ 
<!-- ignore inline styling and wrapper div -->
<div style="background-color: black;">
  <footer class="tsla-footer tsla-footer-light" style="position: static;">
    <div class="container">
      <ul class="tsla-footer-meta">
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Tesla &copy; 2017</a></li>
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Privacy &amp; Legal</a></li>
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Contact</a></li>
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Careers</a></li>
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Forums</a></li>
        <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Locations</a></li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </footer>
</div>

Centered Footer

Some pages or applications might want to have a center-aligned footer.

  • Tesla © 2017
  • Privacy & Legal
  • Contact
  • Careers
  • Forums
  • Locations
▲ 
<!-- ignore inline styling -->
<footer class="tsla-footer tsla-footer-centered" style="position: static;">
  <div class="container">
    <ul class="tsla-footer-meta">
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Tesla &copy; 2017</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Privacy &amp; Legal</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Contact</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Careers</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Forums</a></li>
      <li class="tsla-footer-list_item hide-on-mobile"><a href="#" class="tsla-footer-list_link">Locations</a></li>
    </ul>
  </div>
</footer>
